testcase.name: checkingBrokenLinks

failure.message: The following asserts failed: Broken Link: https://softwaretestingboard.com/magento-store-notes/?utm_source=magento_store&utm_medium=banner&utm_campaign=notes_promo&utm_id=notes_promotion - Response code: 406, Broken Link: https://softwaretestingboard.com/practice-api-testing-using-magento-2/?utm_source=magento_store&utm_medium=banner&utm_campaign=notes_promo&utm_id=API_Testing_Promo - Response code: 406, Broken Link: https://softwaretestingboard.com/write-for-us/?utm_source=magento_store&utm_medium=banner&utm_campaign=notes_promo&utm_id=write4us - Response code: 406, Broken Link: https://softwaretestingboard.com/subscribe/?utm_source=magento_store&utm_medium=banner&utm_campaign=notes_promo&utm_id=email_subscribe - Response code: 406

testcase.name: verifyProductImageColorAgainstSelectedColor

failure.message: The following asserts failed: Color in cart (black) does not match or is not contained in image URL (https://magento.softwaretestingboard.com/pub/media/catalog/product/cache/b45fda5d42e04db84d57ecfd089c603c/m/j/mj12-orange_main_1.jpg) expected [true] but found [false], Color in cart (blue) does not match or is not contained in image URL (https://magento.softwaretestingboard.com/pub/media/catalog/product/cache/b45fda5d42e04db84d57ecfd089c603c/m/j/mj12-orange_main_1.jpg) expected [true] but found [false], Color in cart (black) does not match or is not contained in image URL (https://magento.softwaretestingboard.com/pub/media/catalog/product/cache/b45fda5d42e04db84d57ecfd089c603c/m/j/mj12-orange_main_1.jpg) expected [true] but found [false], Color in cart (blue) does not match or is not contained in image URL (https://magento.softwaretestingboard.com/pub/media/catalog/product/cache/b45fda5d42e04db84d57ecfd089c603c/m/j/mj12-orange_main_1.jpg) expected [true] but found [false]
